QuestData.Title: The Burlap Grind
QuestData.Description: Alright, it's time to take Kota Kon out for her "walk."$B$BWe brewed two fresh pots of kafa just for her and she's all fueled up!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kota Kon at Kota Basecamp to ride her, then kill 100 Hozen along The Burlap Trail.
